description: Temporary Resident Visa (TRV). Note: 10-Year Multiple Entry Visa is no longer standard (Discretionary as of Nov 2024).

meta.processing_time_standard: Standard: ~99 Days (High Volume). CAN+ (US Visa Holders): ~30 Days.
meta.max_stay: Up to 6 months (Officer's discretion at border)
meta.passport_validity: Must be valid for the entire duration of stay
meta.min_funds_requirement: **Standard Benchmark:** Closing balance of **CAD 10,000** (approx. ₹6 Lakhs) per person. *Note: If applying under CAN+, financial proof is WAIVED.*

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Scanned copies of ALL pages (Bio + Visas + Stamps). Validity must cover the trip. Old passports are critical for travel history score.

documents.title: CAN+ Eligibility Proof (Optional)
documents.description: **If you have a valid US Visa:** Upload a clear scan of the US Visa. This triggers 'CAN+' processing (No financials needed, Faster decision).

documents.title: Proof of Means (Standard Track)
documents.description: **Required if NO US Visa:** 1. Bank Statements (Last 4 months, stamped). 2. ITR (3 Years). 3. Employment Letter. *Goal: Show CAD 10,000+ liquid funds.*

documents.title: Purpose of Travel
documents.description: Day-wise Itinerary + Flight Reservation (Hold only) + Hotel Booking.

documents.title: Proof of Home Ties
documents.description: Crucial to avoid 'Section 179(b)' rejection. Upload: Property Deeds, CA Valuation Report, or Employer NOC stating return date.

documents.title: Letter of Invitation
documents.description: If visiting family: Letter stating their status (PR/Citizen), address, and number of people in their household.

steps_flow.title: Create IRCC Account
steps_flow.description:
Go to IRCC’s visitor-visa page — choose Visitor visa (Temporary Resident Visa – TRV). 

You can apply online (recommended) — you need a valid passport, scanner/camera to upload docs, and a credit/debit card for payment. 

Fill the application form IMM 5257 (the main form for TRV)

steps_flow.title: Upload Documents & Pay Fees
steps_flow.description:
You’ll need to upload scanned or photographed copies of: passport, photos, proof of funds, travel plan/itinerary (if any), proof of ties to India (job, assets, family, etc).Action: Create account & Start application for 'Visitor Visa'.

Visa application fee: CAD 100 
Canada
Biometrics fee: CAD 85 (if biometrics required)

steps_flow.title: Receive Biometric Instruction Letter (BIL)
steps_flow.description: fter submission & payment, you’ll get a BIL from IRCC.

steps_flow.title: Wait for Processing
steps_flow.description:
After biometrics, IRCC processes your application. 
Canada
Processing time varies typical timeline given by IRCC

steps_flow.title: Passport Submission
steps_flow.description:
Wait for the **Passport Request Letter** (PPR).
* **Standard:** ~100 Days.
* **CAN+:** ~25 Days.
* **Action:** Submit passport to VFS via 2-way courier service.
